title: Dowload Error
body: Every time I have tried to download the game on my new laptop when I get to the second section of downloads (approximately 30%) it stopts downloading at exactly 260mb left and my download rate drops to zero every time can someone please explain how to fix?

replies.body:
Exact same thing happened to me. You have two options. 1. Use a VPN or 2. Set your DNS manually.

If you don't already know how to do 1. then just don't attempt it. Usually costs more than it's worth.

To set your DNS manually depends on your OS. You need to be an admin to do the following. On Windows, you go into Control Panel>Network and Internet>Network and Sharing Center>Change adapter settings. Then, right-click your adapter and click Properties. Scroll down the box list until you reach "Internet Protocol Version 4 (TCP/IPv4)" and click Properties. Manually set your DNS to 8.8.8.8 as your primary and 8.8.4.4 as your alternative.

Then flush your DNS.

Best of luck.
